law.catch_line: Continuing education requirements for certified persons.
law.text:
The cabinet shall promulgate administrative regulations concerning the continuing education required for renewal of certified persons and shall:
Establish procedures for approving individual courses submitted by a person or entity providing continuing education;
Prescribe the content, duration, and organization of the continuing education courses that contribute to the competence of certified persons; and
Include eight (8) hours of continuing education for measurement contractors and eight (8) hours of continuing education for mitigation contractors per year.
law.history: Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 14, effective June 8, 2011.
